content:
### **🔥 My Recommendation: Start With AI-Driven Resume + Job Application System**  

Here’s why:  

✅ **Resume First = Proof of Concept.**  
The AI-powered resume is **the foundation** of everything. Without it, the job application system doesn’t mean much.  

✅ **Job Application System = Fastest to Market.**  
Automating outreach & applications **can be built quickly and drive immediate results.**  

✅ **It Aligns With Our Public Commitment.**  
We promised **an AI-driven job search experiment.** That starts with showing **how AI can rethink resumes & applications.**  

---

### **📌 MVP Roadmap**
1️⃣ **🔹 Build the AI-Augmented Resume Format (Today & Tomorrow)**  
   - **Structure it to reflect AI-powered augmentation.**  
   - **Auto-generate AI implementation plans for roles.**  
   - **Show how much of a job can be automated & how AI enhances human expertise.**  

2️⃣ **🔹 Develop the AI-Powered Application System (Saturday-Sunday)**  
   - **Automate personalized job applications using AI.**  
   - **AI-driven outreach to hiring managers.**  
   - **Measure how companies respond to AI-enhanced applications.**  

3️⃣ **🔹 Deliver & Launch the MVP on Monday**  
   - **Apply to first batch of jobs using AI-powered resume + outreach system.**  
   - **Share learnings & next steps publicly.**  

---

### **🚀 First Action for Today**  
Let’s **start building the AI-augmented resume format.**  

We need:  
📌 **A structure that makes AI-enhanced candidates stand out.**  
📌 **A way to integrate AI implementation plans directly into the resume.**  
📌 **A format that is instantly understandable by hiring managers.**  

This will **set up everything else.**  

---

**💡 Are we aligned on this? Ready to start building the AI-powered resume?**
